entry.title: Trump pushes conspiracy theory about MSNBC host

media:group.media:title: Trump pushes conspiracy theory about MSNBC host
media:group.media:description: Tweets from President Donald Trump have dredged up a baseless and debunked claim about MSNBC's Joe Scarborough. CNN's Donie O'Sullivan and Brian Stelter discuss the decades-old conspiracy theory. #CNN #News #politics #presidentdonaldtrump #usnews #happeningnow

entry.title: Lemon slams Trump's attacks on Biden and Marine vet congressman

media:group.media:title: Lemon slams Trump's attacks on Biden and Marine vet congressman
media:group.media:description:
CNN's Don Lemon says President Donald Trump is taking the low road by spreading lies about Rep. Conor Lamb (D-PA), MSNBC host Joe Scarborough and retweeting insults aimed at Stacey Abrams and Joe Biden.
#Trump #CNN #News

media:group.media:title: How coronavirus changed Congress
media:group.media:description:
Since the coronavirus pandemic hit the United States, Congress has seen a jump in its approval ratings. Chris Cillizza explains why this is the perfect example of why people don't like the government until they need them.
SOURCES AND FURTHER READING: Congress Job Approval Highest Since 2009 https://news.gallup.com/poll/311129/congress-job-approval-highest-2009.aspx
House passes coronavirus relief bill after Trump announces his support https://www.cnn.com/2020/03/13/politics/coronavirus-relief-congress/index.html Trump signs coronavirus relief legislation into law https://www.cnn.com/2020/03/18/politics/coronavirus-congress-relief-senate-house/index.html
Health Institutions Still Rated Best for COVID-19 Response https://news.gallup.com/poll/309614/health-institutions-rated-best-covid-response.aspx
Congress Job Approval Highest Since 2009 https://news.gallup.com/poll/311129/congress-job-approval-highest-2009.aspx
Clinton says era of big government is 'over' in 1996 State of the Union https://www.washingtonpost.com/video/politics/clinton-says-era-of-big-government-is-over-in-1996-state-of-the-union/2014/01/22/da7c0cb4-83b6-11e3-8099-9181471f7aaf_video.html
Republicans pump brakes on new coronavirus stimulus spending https://www.cnn.com/2020/05/19/politics/coronavirus-stimulus-congress/index.html
House approves $3 trillion Covid aid bill and historic rules change to allow remote voting https://www.cnn.com/2020/05/15/politics/house-vote-covid-aid-3-trillion-remote-voting/index.html
Americans' Trust in Mass Media Edges Down to 41% https://news.gallup.com/poll/267047/americans-trust-mass-media-edges-down.aspx
Poll finds Americans disapprove of media’s handling of coronavirus. But its the same polarized picture as ever https://www.washingtonpost.com/media/2020/03/27/poll-finds-americans-disapprove-medias-handling-coronavirus-its-same-polarized-picture-ever/
About me: I was named "best dressed" in 7th grade. That, along with being CNN's editor at large and author of the daily "Point" newsletter are my proudest achievements. Look for me here every Tuesday and Thursday to find out what’s really going down in politics.
CREDITS Writer: Chris Cillizza The Point team: Leigh Munsil and Allison Gordon Editor: Michelle Cho Producer: Arielle Sacks
Follow Chris on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/cillizzac/ Twitter: https://twitter.com/cillizzacnn Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/chris.cillizza/ Subscribe to The Point newsletter: https://mailchi.mp/cnn/dvgb325pfm
#CNN #Cillizza #Congress

entry.title: Stanley Ho, Macao's 'godfather of gambling,' dies at 98

media:group.media:title: Stanley Ho, Macao's 'godfather of gambling,' dies at 98
media:group.media:description: Stanley Ho, a billionaire businessman who made his fortune in Macao's gambling industry, has died aged 98 in Hong Kong according to his family. CNN's Kristie Lu Stout reports. #CNNi #CNN #News

entry.title: CNN reporter debunks Alabama beachgoers' Covid 19 theories

media:group.media:title: CNN reporter debunks Alabama beachgoers' Covid 19 theories
media:group.media:description: CNN's Gary Tuchman speaks with beachgoers in Gulf Shores, Alabama, about the Covid-19 pandemic. #CNN #News

entry.title: Americans flock to public places for Memorial Day

media:group.media:title: Americans flock to public places for Memorial Day
media:group.media:description: Many Americans visited public places for Memorial Day weekend amid concerns from officials that the crowds could result in a spike of coronavirus cases. CNN's Kyung Lah has more. #CNN #News

entry.title: Mayor to Brazil President Jair Bolsonaro: 'Please shut up and stay home'

media:group.media:title: Mayor to Brazil President Jair Bolsonaro: 'Please shut up and stay home'
media:group.media:description:
In an interview with CNN's Nick Paton Walsh, Arthur Virgilio Neto, mayor of the virus-stricken Brazilian city of Manaus, fired back at President Jair Bolsonaro after footage emerged of Bolsonaro insulting the mayor.
#CNN #News

entry.title: Trump blasts Jeff Sessions as 'not mentally qualified to be attorney general'

media:group.media:title: Trump blasts Jeff Sessions as 'not mentally qualified to be attorney general'
media:group.media:description:
President Trump continued his feud with his former attorney general Jeff Sessions, who recused himself from the Russia investigation in 2017.
#CNN #News

entry.title: Police fire tear gas at protesters as unrest returns to streets of Hong Kong

media:group.media:title: Police fire tear gas at protesters as unrest returns to streets of Hong Kong
media:group.media:description:
After a months-long break due to the coronavirus pandemic, tear gas returned to the streets of central Hong Kong, as police clashed with protesters over a proposed national security law.
#CNN #News

entry.title: Trump spends weekend golfing amid coronavirus pandemic

media:group.media:title: Trump spends weekend golfing amid coronavirus pandemic
media:group.media:description:
President Donald Trump was seen golfing at his Virginia club on Saturday and Sunday, marking his first visit to one of his golf properties since March amid the coronavirus pandemic.
#CNN #News

entry.title: Brian Stelter: How will history remember this moment?

media:group.media:title: Brian Stelter: How will history remember this moment?
media:group.media:description:
CNN's Brian Stelter looks at how history will remember the coronavirus pandemic and the political response to it.
#CNN #News

entry.title: Fareed Zakaria: Why Trump changed his tune on China

media:group.media:title: Fareed Zakaria: Why Trump changed his tune on China
media:group.media:description: CNN's Fareed Zakaria says President Donald Trump is returning to an old pattern of blaming foreigners to cover for his administration's response to the coronavirus pandemic. #CNN #News #usnews #politics #fareedzakariagps #presidentdonaldtrump

entry.title: John King: The reopening is now a full 50 state experiment

media:group.media:title: John King: The reopening is now a full 50 state experiment
media:group.media:description:
CNN's John King breaks down the numbers as states begin the process of reopening during the coronavirus pandemic.
#CNN #News

entry.title: Hear Trump criticize Obama for playing golf during crisis

media:group.media:title: Hear Trump criticize Obama for playing golf during crisis
media:group.media:description:
As coronavirus cases in the US continue to rise, President Donald Trump was seen golfing at the Trump National Golf Club in Sterling, Virginia. This is the first time he has been seen on a golf course since the pandemic began. In 2014, Trump criticized former President Barack Obama for golfing after a second confirmed case of Ebola was reported in the United States.
#CNN #News

entry.title: Smerconish: Is Tesla the latest victim of the political divide?

media:group.media:title: Smerconish: Is Tesla the latest victim of the political divide?
media:group.media:description:
After Tesla CEO Elon Musk's recent political activity, could the car be switching political lanes? CNN's Michael Smerconish discusses.
#CNN #News
